body:
That's a pretty good idea.

On 11 December 2014 at 16:03, Minux Ma <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I have another related feature request:
> given that we disabled issue on sub repos, should we automatically
> transform
> Fixes #xxxx in the message for a sub-repo to Fixes golang/go#xxxx?
